trans:
As a service desk operator, you will have the opportunity to work on exciting projects related to technical infrastructure and internal company applications. Our decentralized teams of experts will be on hand to support you in your areas of responsibility.
In detail, you will be responsible for the following tasks:
• Collaboration with 1st level support (service desk, ticket system, hotline)
• Maintenance and provision of workstation PCs, laptops and printers • Support in the operation of on-site network and media technology
• Maintenance of master data in a configuration management database
• Documentation of instructions and workarounds
YOUR SKILLS – WHAT YOU CONTRIBUTE TO MTI
• Completed vocational training in the field of computer science (e.g. system integration) or a degree in computer science or comparable
qualification
• Expertise in technical support and IT issues within the framework of 1st level support
• Excellent knowledge of installing and configuring client systems under the Windows and MacOS operating systems • Know-how in setting up and maintaining cross-team operational documentation
• At best, initial experience with handling common Microsoft applications and services (Active Directory, Exchange, Teams,
